title: Unexplained connection problem
body: While me and my premade friend was playing a ranked game in the same time the game was trying to recconect for no reason and was waiting to reconect and we lost so much time and our enemies pushed my lane and my friends lane the time we were afk about this problem...and we lost the game and we lost league points too. I send this message to ask you if you can give us back the league points that we lost cause we lost them about this unexplained problem. Thank you a lot for your time

replies.body:
We cannot modify or add LP lost for any reason, unfortunately. We're locked out of making these types of changes to prevent any abuse of the system.

If you encounter connection issues again, it could be a good idea to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if you have any questions.
